diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $h$ units.
The measure of angle $CAB$ is $60$ degrees.
The length of the line $AC$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is equal to the length of the line $BC$.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $BC$, and $CD$ forming a triangle $ABC$ and its height $BD$.
